org.terrier.structures

Interface BitFilePosition

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BitIndexPointer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDocumentIndexEntry, BasicLexiconEntry, BlockFieldLexiconEntry, BlockLexiconEntry, DocumentIndexEntry, FieldDocumentIndexEntry, FieldLexiconEntry, FilePosition, MultiDocumentEntry, NonIncrementalDocumentIndexEntry, SimpleBitIndexPointer, SimpleDocumentIndexEntry

    public interface BitFilePosition
    A bit file position
